listitem.para: Outputs the value of the last network data received on the accept socket. It is best to call this procedure in your receiveready callback code of your NETACCEPTON command. If you don't, then the data will be discarded the next time receiveready is run.

listitem.programlisting:
; The Initiator (connector) Sends Data To Who Accepted the connection
NETSTARTUP ; Start up the network
; Wait for someone to connect to you on socket 5124 SHOW NETACCEPTON 5124 [] [PRINT NETACCEPTRECEIVEVALUE] true
; Connect to MyMachineName on socket 5124 (myself) SHOW NETCONNECTON "MyMachineName 5124 [PRINT [Ok to Send Again]] [] true
WAIT 100 ; Wait little for connection to establish Ok to Send Again Ok to Send Again Ok to Send Again SHOW NETCONNECTSENDVALUE [Hello thanks for taking my call] ; Send some data true
WAIT 100 ; Wait a little before we shut things down Hello thanks for taking my call
NETCONNECTOFF NETACCEPTOFF NETSHUTDOWN
